Posted By: SlowMoRiot (1/22/2013 9:28:16 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Now, if it was in Blue, it'd be pretty good. However, green has a decent amount of combat tricks. Also, [Necrobite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Necrobite) was just printed, and that makes this look bad.  
  
Saying something like "adding First Strike" is absolutely idiotic, but I think that'd be the only way a card like this would see a lot of play. Maybe making it ![2](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=2&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol) or changing the colour to Black (![2](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=2&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)) would even it out a little.   
  
It's a good thing this isn't ![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol) though. In truth, the 3-cost is very fair, because this technically is Green's [Murder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Murder). Any cheaper, and you'd need to throw in a drawback.
posts.html:
Now, if it was in Blue, it'd be pretty good. However, green has a decent amount of combat tricks. Also, Necrobite was just printed, and that makes this look bad.

Saying something like "adding First Strike" is absolutely idiotic, but I think that'd be the only way a card like this would see a lot of play. Maybe making it or changing the colour to Black () would even it out a little.

It's a good thing this isn't though. In truth, the 3-cost is very fair, because this technically is Green's Murder. Any cheaper, and you'd need to throw in a drawback.
